医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
IgE抗体在靶向HER2癌对其他疗法的抗性方面表现出希望激活患者自身针对癌症的免疫系统（称为免疫疗法）的抗体治疗越来越多地被研究为化学疗法和放疗的替代方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/ige-antibodies-show-promise-in-in-targeting-her2-cancers-cancers-耐药到to-other-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/ige-antibodies-show-promise-in-promise-in-in-targeting-her2-cancers-cancers-耐药到to-other-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53916EC3-5F25-454D-BD31-E209210424B4 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 22:45:44 -0400 IgE antibodies show promise in targeting HER2 cancers resistant to other therapies
研究揭示了多巴胺在降低奖励记忆价值中的作用密歇根州立大学的新研究扩展了对大脑化学多巴胺的当前理解，发现它在降低与奖励相关的记忆的价值中起着作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/study-reveals-dopamines-dopamines-in-role-in-reducing-the-value-falue of-Reward-Memories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/study-reveals-dopamines-dopamines-in-role-in-reducing-the-value-the-value of-reward-reward-memories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c4ffa16f-9d4d-4dfc-b990-56b886591c80 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 22:40:54 -0400 Study reveals dopamine's role in reducing the value of reward memories
大学运动员的脑震荡导致大脑变化持续一年对于脑震荡的大学运动员来说，大脑变化在脑部扫描中可能仍然可见，直到他们被清除恢复游戏后一年，美国神经病学医学杂志于2025年3月12日在线发表的一项研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/concussions-in-college-andletes-lead-lead-to-brain-changes-changes-lasting-a-a-a-al.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/concussions-in-college-andletes-lead-lead-to-brain-changes-changes-lasting-lasting-a-a-al.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=F074C540-D0C1-447F-83CA-0BAB7EA83516 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 22:37:07 -0400 Concussions in college athletes lead to brain changes lasting a year
新技术有效地识别了侵袭性的髓母细胞瘤加拿大研究人员开发了一种有效的新技术，用于鉴定侵袭性的髓母细胞瘤 - 儿童中最常见的恶性脑肿瘤类型，并可能从不必要的治疗及其有害的长期副作用中保留年轻患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/new-technique-effectively-indistifies-gagrescement-medulloblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/new-technique-effectively-istifies-gagressive-medulloblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6df8cdfd-f163-432d-8795-58a836c6d262 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 22:32:48 -0400 New technique effectively identifies aggressive medulloblastoma
研究：睡眠质量差可能会增加对阴谋信念的敏感性诺丁汉大学的一项新研究表明，睡眠质量差可能会增加对阴谋信念的敏感性，而抑郁症可能在这种关系中起关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/study-poor-sleep-sleep-quality-may-increase-susteribility-comspiracy-beliefs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/study-poor-sleep-sleep-quality-may-increase-susteribility-comspiracy-beliefs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f6e628d-e735-4536-A2BD-0E8156C2EDA7 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 22:26:37 -0400 Study: Poor sleep quality may increase susceptibility to conspiracy beliefs
研究揭示了防止巨细胞病毒扩散到胎儿的关键见解一项新的Weill Cornell医学和俄勒冈州健康与科学大学的共同研究为开发疫苗的开发提供了关键的见解，该疫苗可以更有效地阻止胎盘跨胎盘的巨细胞病毒或CMV的传播，并在婴儿出生之前对婴儿的传播。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/study-reveals-key-ingeights-for-preventing-cytomegalovirus-spread-spread-spread-to-fetuses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/study-reveals-key-ingeights-for-preventing-cytomegalovirus-spread-spread-spread-spread to-fetuses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8E25C17B-FE20-4998-B6AE-B8B21F6E4CFF Wed, 12 Mar 2025 22:16:53 -0400 Study reveals key insights for preventing cytomegalovirus spread to fetuses
四个新机构加入BD²集成网络，以改善躁郁症护理如今，双相情感障碍（BD²）蓬勃发展的突破性发现宣布了四个新的国家机构，每个机构将获得230万美元的收入，以加入BD²综合网络，BD²综合网络是一种合作研究和临床护理模型，将改善患有双相情感障碍的人的护理，干预和现象。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/four-new-inew-institutions-news-news-news-news-news-news-news-news-news-news-news-news-news-join-bdc2b2-integrated-network-network-network-to-to-to-impolard-bimpolrove-双极 - disorder-disorder-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/four-new-inew-institutions-new-new-inew-new-new-join-bdc2b2-integrated-network-network-to-to-impolrove-bimlrove-bipolrove-bipolrove-biarl-disorder-disorder-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2890694-fbfe-4384-AA19-D54D54DD44BD41F Wed, 12 Mar 2025 22:12:16 -0400 Four new institutions join BD² Integrated Network to improve bipolar disorder care
发展心脏单元使用“速度约会”来找到正确的匹配在发育中的心脏中，细胞会散发出来，互相碰撞以找到它们的位置，木桩很高：与错误的细胞配对可能意味着跳动的心脏和一个流行的人之间的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/developing-hend-cells-use-speed-speed-dating-to-find-the-the-right-match.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/developing-hent-cells-use-speed-speed-dating-to-find-the-the-the-the-right-match.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8A5233F-3D42-49AC-9287-DE9EF2C619CB Wed, 12 Mar 2025 22:10:02 -0400 Developing heart cells use "speed dating" to find the right match
粮食不安全与中年患心脏病的风险增加有关今天努力负担得起的食物可能意味着明天心脏病。根据新的西北医学研究，即使在人口统计学和社会经济因素上，患有粮食不安全的年轻人在中年患有心脏病的风险增加了41％。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/Food-insecurity-linked-to-increased-risk-of-developing-heart-disease-in-midlife.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/Food-insecurity-linked-to-increased-risk-of-developing-heart-disease-in-midlife.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d8d8d8df3ba-d085-4bf5-b196-50575b6c7222 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 22:05:02 -0400 Food insecurity linked to increased risk of developing heart disease in midlife
纳米凝胶可以改善尿路感染的抗生素递送科罗拉多大学Anschutz医疗校园的研究人员研究了一种新方法，将抗生素，特别是庆大霉素直接传递到膀胱组织中，以更好地治疗UTI。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/nanogels-can-inmimprove-antibrove-antibrove-delivery-for-for-rinary-urinary-tract-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250312/nanogels-can-improve-antibrove-antibrove-delivery-delivery-for-urinary-urinary-tract-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db6A2A9B-475B-475B-43C7-A606-A4733D3958F1 Wed, 12 Mar 2025 22:00:03 -0400 Nanogels can improve antibiotic delivery for urinary tract infections
